medical_history.chief_complaint: Thickened toenails for more than 20 years.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began over 20 years ago. Patient used an over-the-counter antifungal cream intermittently to treat pruritus of her feet. No pain in the nails or difficulty ambulating was reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Asthma, symptom-free for more than 7 years without medications.
medical_history.family_history: Father and sister had similar, but less severe, toenail problems.
medical_history.social_history: Stay-at-home mother, denied prior toenail trauma, frequent sports activities, or hyperhidrosis of the feet.
